basic.description: This course is an introduction to superconductivity for applications, fundamentals of the superconducting state, transport current and metallurgy of superconductors, Superconducting electrons and magnets, system engineering.
basic.subject: EML
basic.title: Applied Superconductivity

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: EEL 3472, EGM 3520, EML 3234, and PHY 3101.
